original_text: And they that were sent went their way, and found even as he had said unto them.
korean_text: 보내심을 받은 자들이 가서 그 말씀하신 대로 만난지라

sentences.original_text: And they that were sent went their way
sentences.korean_translation: 보냄을 받은 자들이 그들의 길을 갔더니

sentences.original_text: and found even as he had said unto them
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들에게 말한 바와 같이 발견하니라
